sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const Home = () => { const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const name = event.target.name.value; const email = event.target.email.value; const message = event.target.message.value; if (!name || !email || !message) { alert('Please fill in all fields.'); return; } alert(`Thank you for your message, ${name}! I will get back to you soon.`); event.target.name.value = ''; event.target.email.value = ''; event.target.message.value = ''; }; return (

Welcome to Brad Matera's Portfolio

Get in Touch

Contact Info

Olympia, WA, USA
bradmatera@gmail.com
+1 (360) 970-0581

LinkedIn GitHub YouTube
); }; export default Home;
